mapper.sql: id, user_id, activity_id, coupon_id, goods_amount, pay_amount, create_time,customer_id
mapper.select: select count(1) from write_off where user_id = #{userid}
select a.*,b.nick_name as customerName,b.head_img as customerImg from write_off a left join use_user b on a.customer_id = b.id where a.user_id = #{userId} and activity_id = 13
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update write_off
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_amount = #{goodsAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pay_amount = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
customer_id = #{customerId},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update write_off set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_amount = #{goodsAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_amount = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, customer_id = #{customerId} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
